Features

Combat
Parry: 7 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Suit Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Boot Spikes (d6+d4); Double Toothpick (d6+d6); Throwing Knife (d6+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0)

Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Winter Soul: +2 Armor vs. cold attacks
Arcana
Powers:
Cold Hardy: (2 PP) RSelf Gains protection from cold hazards and -4 damage from cold (Raise -6) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target) (see Environmental Protection)
Ice Blade: (2 PP) RTouch Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target) (see Smite)
Ice Glide: (2 PP) RSelf Gives dbl Pace (Raise also Run as a free action) while maintained (+1 PP/additional Speed target; +2/+3 PP Sloth slows all in a 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Speed reduces target multi-action penalty by 2; +1 PP Sloth Spirit-2) (see Sloth/Speed)
Icy Skin: (1 PP) RSelf Frost on skin gives +2 Armor (Raise +4) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP +4 Armor (Raise +6); +1 PP Target gains Toughness instead of Armor) (see Protection)
Arcana Notes: Frigid Form: May cast cold Armor, Environmental Protection, Smite, and Speed on self at will
